title: Sir Joseph Thomson
brief_description: Born in 1856, Joseph Thomson devoted his life to the study of physical science and acheived distinction as an experimentalist and as a teacher. In this film he presents a paper on the importance of scientific discoveries and their application in commerse and industry, resulting in employment and technological advances.
